title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
Introducing the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky! Experience the ultimate convenience and versatility in food dehydration with this powerful 600W dehydrator. Designed in California, it offers a max temperature of 165°F and hot air circulation for quick and efficient drying.

This dehydrator comes fully equipped with everything you need to get started. It includes 6 stainless steel trays, a mesh screen, a fruit roll sheet, a user manual, and a 50-recipe cookbook. With a large drying space of 6.48ft², you can easily dehydrate enough snacks for the whole family.

Enjoy precise control over time and temperature with the digital control panel. Set the timer for up to 48 hours and adjust the temperature between 95°–165°F, with accuracy down to the degree. The food-grade stainless steel trays are not only safer and more durable, but also dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.

Operating at noise levels less than 48dB, this dehydrator is quiet and convenient to use. It also features auto shutoff and overheat protection for added safety. The glass door allows you to check on your snacks without interrupting the dehydrating process.

Extend the shelf life of your favorite foods with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. Don't miss out on this amazing kitchen appliance that delivers delicious and healthy treats in less time. Grab yours today and experience the difference!

Introducing the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, a must-have kitchen appliance for all your dehydrating needs. Designed in California with a powerful 600W motor, this dehydrator allows you to cook delicious and healthy treats in less time. The hot air circulation from the rear fan ensures even drying, while the maximum temperature of 165°F / 73°C guarantees perfect results every time.

This food dehydrator comes fully equipped with everything you need to get started. It includes 6 stainless steel trays, providing a large drying space of 6.48ft². The trays are made with premium food-grade stainless steel, making them safer, more durable, and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning. Plus, they come with a mesh screen and a fruit roll sheet, allowing you to dehydrate a variety of foods. 

Setting the precise temperature and time is a breeze with the digital control panel. The timer can be set for up to 48 hours, and the temperature can be adjusted between 95°–165°F with accuracy down to the degree. Say goodbye to guesswork and enjoy perfectly dehydrated foods every time.

Our food dehydrator is not only efficient, but also quiet to use. With noise levels less than 48dB, you can simply press the Start button and go to sleep while your food is being dehydrated.

Safety is our top priority. The dehydrator features an auto shutoff function that kicks in right when the timer ends. It also has overheat protection to prevent any accidents. Rest assured that your safety is guaranteed while using our product.

The glass door allows you to check on your snacks throughout the entire dehydrating process, ensuring optimal results. 

Extend the shelf life of your favorite foods with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. Order yours today and discover a healthier way to snack.

Introducing the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. Designed in California, this dehydrator allows you to cook delicious and healthy treats in less time. With a powerful 600W motor and a maximum temperature of 165°F, you can enjoy hot air circulation from the rear fan for even drying. 

This food dehydrator comes fully equipped with 6 stainless steel trays, providing you with ample space to dehydrate enough snacks for the whole family. The trays are made from food-grade stainless steel, making them safe, durable, and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning. 

With the digital control panel, you can set the timer for up to 48 hours and dry foods at the exact temperature you desire, between 95°–165°F, with accuracy down to the degree. The dehydrator also features a glass door, allowing you to check on your snacks throughout the entire drying process. 

Worried about noise? Don't be. With noise levels less than 48dB, you can simply press the Start button and let the dehydrator do its work while you go to sleep. And when the timer ends, the auto shutoff feature kicks in for added safety. In the event of overheating, the overheat protection will activate, giving you peace of mind. 

Included with the dehydrator are a mesh screen, a fruit roll sheet, a user manual, and a 50-recipe cookbook to inspire your culinary creations. The dehydrator operates on AC 120V 60Hz power and 600W, perfect for use in the USA and Canada. 

Extend the shelf life of your favorite foods with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. Grab yours today and start enjoying the benefits of homemade, healthy snacks.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver

Description: DESIGNED IN CALIFORNIA: Cook delicious and healthy treats in less time with a 600W rated power, a max temperature of 165°F / 73°C, and hot air circulation from the rear fan

FULLY EQUIPPED: Your food dehydrator comes with 6 stainless steel trays (12 x 13 in), 1 mesh screen, 1 fruit roll sheet, 1 user manual, and a 50-recipe cookbook. Search for C267-2MS, C267-FR, or C267-2ST to find more accessories

LARGE CAPACITY: Dehydrate enough snacks for the whole family with up to 6.5 ft² of drying space

PRECISE TEMP & TIME: Use the digital control panel to set the timer for up to 48 hours. Dry foods at the exact temperature you want between 95°–165°F, with accuracy down to the degree

PREMIUM MATERIAL TRAYS: Made with food-grade stainless steel, the trays are safer, more durable, and dishwasher-safe. Wash the trays on the top rack of your dishwasher and remove them before the drying cycle

QUIET TO USE: With noise levels less than 48dB, simply press the Start button to dehydrate your food and go to sleep

SAFE TO USE: Auto shutoff kicks in right when the timer ends. Overheat protection will activate if the dehydrator overheats. 120V, 600W. Please note that this voltage only applies to USA and Canada

GLASS DOOR: Use the glass door to check on your snacks throughout the entire dehydrating process

Key FeaturesTouch-Control LED DisplayTimer (30 min–48 hr)Adjustable Temperature (95°–165°F)Dishwasher Safe TraysAutomatic ShutoffMemory FunctionOverheat ProtectionExtends the Shelf Life of Your Favorite FoodsIncluded Recipe Book with 50 Original RecipesSpecifications and AccessoriesVoltage: AC 120V 60HzPower: 600W6 x Stainless Steel TraysTray Size: 12 x 13 in1 x Mesh ScreenMesh Screen Size: 10.7 x 11.8 in1 x Fruit Roll SheetFruit Roll Sheet Size: 11.3 x 12.8 in
